songs.title: Heat (Luke Solomon Remix)
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
Ooh, ooh yeah...

[Chorus]
I need more heat from you, baby
Make me feel weak for you, baby
I need more heat from you, baby
Make me feel weak for you, baby
I need more heat from you, baby
Make me feel weak for you, baby
Oh, wanna feel alive
Oh, like my heart's in the wild
I need more heat from you, baby
Make me feel weak for you, baby
Better than that
I need more heat from you, baby
Make me feel weak for you, baby
I need more heat from you, baby
Make me feel weak for you, baby
I need more heat from you, baby
Make me feel weak for you, baby
Don't let me down
I need more heat from you, baby
Make me feel weak for you, baby
Don't let me down
I need more heat from you, baby
Make me feel weak for you, baby

[Outro]
Fire...
